common_patterns: RGB values trending toward muted tones
High contrast between text and background
Consistent use of grays for secondary elements

patterns: Sans-serif fonts dominate (Helvetica, Arial, system fonts)
Medium to bold font weights for headings
High contrast text colors for readability

design_principles: Minimal visual clutter to let photos be the focus
Consistent spacing using 8px or 4px grid systems
Subtle shadows and borders for card-based layouts
Progressive disclosure to avoid overwhelming users
Clear visual hierarchy with typography scale
Hover states that provide immediate feedback

color_scheme.accent: Single accent color (blue or green) for actions
color_scheme.text: High contrast text (#212529 on light, #f8f9fa on dark)
color_scheme.photo_borders: Subtle borders (#dee2e6) to define photo boundaries

typography.font_family: System font stack: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto
typography.scale: 14px base, 16px for important text, 20px+ for headings
typography.weight: 400 for body, 500-600 for important elements, 700 for headings

layout.photo_grid: CSS Grid with auto-fit columns, 16px gap
layout.max_width: Constrain content to 1200px for optimal viewing

interactions.hover_effects: Subtle scale (1.02) or shadow increase on hover
interactions.selection: Clear visual feedback with accent color border/background
